channel.title: Changing All Emotes, and Dying Gltch [pimpscape]
channel.description:
How do I remove all of the emotes, and put new stuff on them, and have them telly you places...also, how do I fix the dying glitch in pimpscape?
Thank you.

Ahh, now where would I add that into client.java?

Thanks though. =P

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Ah, to fix this you could make disconnect = true; for when you die, then this wouldn’t happen. There’s definately a tutorial on fixing that.

item.title: Changing All Emotes, and Dying Gltch [pimpscape]
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

I am talking aoubt fxing the dying glitch, when you die, you spawn at the bank, but for other players you are in the dummes, when your really not.

Then you walk over to the dummies, and people think your at prayer…

confusing eh?
